name: Zoios.
headline: Help start- and scale-ups excel at People, Culture and Performance.
description:
Are you looking for a platform that can help you overcome people and culture challenges? 

We combine human expertise with advanced data analytics to help you achieve the results you dream about. Our platform helps organizations build a great culture, hire the right talent and lead their people.

There is no need to be guessing, and worrying all the time. Use Zoios to get real-time actions that will help you create an organization where employees thrive.

founders.name: Christian H√∏jbo M√∏ller, Founder
founders.description: I moved to Mumbai, India alone at age 15. When I came home I built a fashion webshop in Flash - went terribly but I naturally learned a ton. Went on to work in marketing as the SEO Lead for GroupM in The Nordics, before venturing out into startup life again with a supplement platform (raised some money and had a good run, but never a great business case). Went back to management consulting for a few years before I convinced Mikkel to join me at Zoios!

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/654f5e9926c56cfcfb2ab126_Sales%20guy.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/654f5e99f6654b9490e207a7_Executive%20leader.jpg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/654f5e995228dbc3c8476bd3_Finance%20guy.jpg)
BETTER PEOPLE AND CULTURE.
# Go beyond intuition. Empower your people.
The worlds most intuitive and actionable engagement platform.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67287ce63b68ae7b58872f7a_Zoios%20People%20Dashboards.png)
TAKE A QUICK TOUR.
## Are you curious?
Learn more about our name, beliefs, and product below.
Scroll to see all options.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/672614fb0ae5fc4b6617c2f5_coffee.svg)
We believe people are good.
People are inherently good and capable of achieving great things.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157fd4bb8d71130fff74_bar-chart.svg)
But better insights give superpowers.
Good intentions are great, but we predict stress and provide concrete insights and recommendations.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261571d1523fd883894223_monitor.svg)
And technology can make it easier.
Modern tech can reduce tasks that usually take half a day to just a few minutes.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f6a85fdbae2c5ca2e_arrow-up-right.svg)
We help you activate the full potential.
Our experienced consultants are here to help you and your managers maximize the platform's potential, ensuring you achieve significant impact.
OUTCOME.
## Quick and intuitive.
We believe in the power of great leadership and trust that managers have good intentions. They just need insights, meaningful frameworks, and more time, and that's exactly what we give them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157dd1523fd883894b2f_clock.svg)
Proactively ensure well-being.
Leaders get real-time report into the well-being of their team, so they can proactively focus on the things that matter the most to their people.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157c4dacaf7dcd281aba_check-square.svg)
Align expectations with goals.
Leaders get the tools to effeciently have 1-on-1 conversations with their team to align expectations, set goals, and remember agreements. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726156b1d2fa696f2113982_star.svg)
Utilize everyone's unique skills.
Leaders get easy-to-understand personality profiles of each team member to meaningfully utilize each person's unique strengths.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f6a85fdbae2c5ca2e_arrow-up-right.svg)
Drive sustainable performance.
Leaders get insights into each person's performance and areas of improvement to drive development and sustainable performance.
HOW IS IT POSSIBLE? üìü 
## Data and AI power.
Our AI enables you to continuously learn from the successes and failures of others. In real-time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261579ff840a2e54deb681_crop.svg)
### Collective data model
We utilize a structured approach across all companies, to ensure you are part of the collective data model.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6110b06f10260e518f5d3077/6110b1396056a5e6b0bd01f9_Dot%20Wave.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f0ba3560e3a3eedb8_bar-chart-2.svg)
### Millions of data points
We have analyzed data from thousands of people and tracked numerous initiatives to determine what works and what doesn't.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6110b06f10260e518f5d3077/6110b1396056a5e6b0bd01f9_Dot%20Wave.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261579401a9751197c2b39_cpu.svg)
### Applied AI
The application of intelligent Gen-AI enables us to not only identify insights, but give you contextual recommendations in real-time.
AVG. IMPACT OF USING ZOIOS. üöÄ
## You get what you measure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157fd4bb8d71130fff74_bar-chart.svg)
#### 18%
Increase in well-being.
Well-being increases by 18% across all drivers in the first six months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261569d7f0f0e60f6413aa_thumbs-up.svg)
#### 14%
Improved job satisfaction.
Self-reported employee satisfaction increases by 14% in the first six months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f6a85fdbae2c5c9f9_battery-charging.svg)
#### 19%
Reduction in stress.
Work-related stress scores decrease by 19% in the first six months.
Zoios is used by thousands of leaders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233f0f02cc8ec332afa3_Bech-Bruun.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5baedc79548fbec67770_Telenor.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae3a1065282f422d91_Donkey%20Republic.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae2b823f00e4b95d12_Veo%20Technologies.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233e043e9f9b960a12d1_E-boks.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67ac463a3095508a69312bbb_NoA%20Ignite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233e472164be68d394c3_Female%20Invest.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233eae5ac991d8d230e1_LEAD%20Agency.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67ac44e170d17232be10ec3b_Vertica%20logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae97652f037ecd6816_Goodiebox.png)
MODULES.
## Everything your leaders need.
Here are the key modules and features you and your leaders need to succeed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/672615724dacaf7dcd280f54_mail.svg)
Amazing pulse surveys.
Our data-driven and statistically validated well-being survey runs on a quarterly or monthly basis to ensure we don't just guess how our people are doing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261575ce4a14e2437709d9_git-branch.svg)
180¬∞ or 360¬∞ feedback.
Our plug-and-play model for getting feedback from peers to ensure development on both, an individual, and team level, is critical for long-term success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261572c8dae55549d42840_loader.svg)
Personality archetypes.
Our personality archetypes enable you to assess the culture and dynamics of a team as well as understand each member of your team to a much larger degree.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261572b77fa098ee7ad508_message-square.svg)
1-on-1 Journal.
Our easy-to-use journal documents all conversations, tracks goals, agreements and ensures you are developing and aligning expectations with all of your people.
IntegrationS. üíª
## Employee data with one click.
We integrate directly with over 60 HR-IS platforms and directories.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b3f174493b2e166bd70_Integration%20-%20Recruitee.svg)
Recruitee
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b49b0cd9215431c6883_Integration%20-%20Deel.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b518b455abe44445c38_Integration%20-%20Gusto.png)
Gusto
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b5ad419cc388df7239c_Integration%20-%20Okta.jpeg)
Okta
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b63faf943d8ad866d45_Integration%20-%20Humaans.webp)
Humaans
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b6c31434c0b722c18c6_Integration%20-%20Teamtailor.png)
TeamTailor
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b734e9a7521c51e0934_Integration%20-%20Greenhouse.png)
GreenHouse
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b803f6f523b6a65c1e7_Integration%20-%20Azure%20AD.png)
Azure AD
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b8caee1a748f3eecd9b_Integration%20-%20Google.png)
Google
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602b9e01c2ea7ece69a91a_Integration%20-%20Bamboo%20HR.png)
Bamboo
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602badd62b5257f6b13940_Integration%20-%20Personio.png)
Personio
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602bb6cb83e179c9455dfe_Integration%20-%20SAP.png)
SAP
And many more...
FEATURES.
## A leadership platform.
See some of the reasons why most People & Culture teams love Zoios.
###### Get to the bottom of challenges.
Not only can you dive into segments and see heatmaps, but you can also get context in qualitative comments.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/667178f6ff05e2cc16f92512_Comments%20and%20qualitative%20feedback.png)
###### Keep your finger on the pulse.
Always know how the organization is doing and whether your People, Culture and Leadership efforts are progressing as planned.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602cf52df907ea2e7f9d2d_Track%20scores%20over%20time.png)
###### AI-powered recommendations.
Our algorithms automatically detect the drivers and factors with the most potential, and our AI helps you ideate the best way forward.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602cdc84adec7198bf7186_Leadership%20Recommendations.png)
###### Organizational overview.
See exactly which locations, departments or teams require more focus and leadership efforts.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602cb0ba1412588430d71d_Department%20overview.png)
###### Identify areas of improvement.
You will instantly know your organizational and cultural strengths, as well as the most important areas of improvement.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66602c9a49845258b889b6fb_Well-being%20Drivers.png)
REFERENCES. üí¨
## Stop guessing.
Stop guessing how your team feels. For your sake.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/6671808ae6f7ee66c0de028a_Jon%20Mandorf.jpeg)
Mighty Monday
Jon Mandorf
Partner and CEO
"I've been working with a lot 'people and culture platforms, but Zoios is the first one I have tried that actually makes it easy, accessible and actionable to create changes that matter. Ongoing meetings with their talented consultants ensure that we are constantly heading in the right direction"
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/6671805ff95874d61896384e_Louise%20Lundgreen.jpeg)
Texta
Louise Lundgreen
Operations Lead
"Zoios is a great tool for us as it helps us keep our finger on the pulse. Zoios continually assists us in identifying areas where we can make an extra effort."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/667180284b27a9d80021a66c_Tenna%20Viid%20J%C3%B8rgensen.jpeg)
SustainX
Tenna Viid J√∏rgensen
Head of People & Culture
"At SustainX, our culture statement is 'We take care of ourselves, each other, and the planet.' The order is important, and Zoios is a tool we use to assess whether we are creating the right conditions for everyone to thrive, take care of themselves, and feel good at work."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/66717ff0cd4c8adfb657f58b_Rasmus%20Schmiegelow.jpeg)
Goodiebox
Rasmus Schmiegelow
Co-founder and CEO
"At Goodiebox, it is an absolute given that the leaders use Zoios. Because we will never reach the potential of the company or our employees if the employees do not feel engaged, empowered, and trusted."
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/6669a17f3a9f0781083b9ba4_Anita%20H%C3%B8rdum.jpeg)
LEAD Agency
Anita H√∏rdum
Partner & Head of HR
" We do not have a formal hierarchy and the analyzes prove that our employees really thrive in that. But Zoios has still really helped us identify the areas where we can, and should, strive to improve. "
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/665f423d4ec6c6495cfddb39/6669a15690c0e63752062928_Pernille%20Bastholm.jpeg)
Grafikr
Pernille Bastholm
HR & Operations Lead
" As an agency, the core of our business is our people. Zoios has been our organizational compass. It helps us navigate by delivering reports, analyses, insights, or ideas for all our management meetings. "
INTERACTIVE DEMO. üëè

Take a tour around the plat or get an account for free.
[See the platform](https://zoios.io/</free-trial>)[Get a free account](https://zoios.io/</free-trial>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/672603844999bb6a4e3337bc_Full%20logo%20transparent.png)](https://zoios.io/<#>)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f0ba3560e3a3eedb8_bar-chart-2.svg)
### Millions of data points
We have analyzed data from thousands of people and tracked numerous initiatives to determine what works and what doesn't.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6110b06f10260e518f5d3077/6110b1396056a5e6b0bd01f9_Dot%20Wave.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261579401a9751197c2b39_cpu.svg)
### Applied AI
The application of intelligent Gen-AI enables us to not only identify insights, but give you contextual recommendations in real-time.
AVG. IMPACT OF USING ZOIOS. üöÄ
## You get what you measure.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157fd4bb8d71130fff74_bar-chart.svg)
#### 18%
Increase in well-being.
Well-being increases by 18% across all drivers in the first six months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261569d7f0f0e60f6413aa_thumbs-up.svg)
#### 14%
Improved job satisfaction.
Self-reported employee satisfaction increases by 14% in the first six months.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/6726157f6a85fdbae2c5c9f9_battery-charging.svg)
#### 19%
Reduction in stress.
Work-related stress scores decrease by 19% in the first six months.
Zoios is used by thousands of leaders.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233f0f02cc8ec332afa3_Bech-Bruun.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5baedc79548fbec67770_Telenor.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae3a1065282f422d91_Donkey%20Republic.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae2b823f00e4b95d12_Veo%20Technologies.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233e043e9f9b960a12d1_E-boks.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67ac463a3095508a69312bbb_NoA%20Ignite.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233e472164be68d394c3_Female%20Invest.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67af233eae5ac991d8d230e1_LEAD%20Agency.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67ac44e170d17232be10ec3b_Vertica%20logo.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/665b5bae97652f037ecd6816_Goodiebox.png)
MODULES.
## Everything your leaders need.
Here are the key modules and features you and your leaders need to succeed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/672615724dacaf7dcd280f54_mail.svg)
Amazing pulse surveys.
Our data-driven and statistically validated well-being survey runs on a quarterly or monthly basis to ensure we don't just guess how our people are doing.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261575ce4a14e2437709d9_git-branch.svg)
180¬∞ or 360¬∞ feedback.
Our plug-and-play model for getting feedback from peers to ensure development on both, an individual, and team level, is critical for long-term success.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261572c8dae55549d42840_loader.svg)
Personality archetypes.
Our personality archetypes enable you to assess the culture and dynamics of a team as well as understand each member of your team to a much larger degree.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/654cf549ab5aa29707ebe1eb/67261572b77fa098ee7ad508_message-square.svg)
1-on-1 Journal.
Our easy-to-use journal documents all conversations, tracks goals, agreements and ensures you are developing and aligning expectations with all of your people.

We integrate directly with over 60 HR-IS platforms and directories.

generated_description:
Zoios is a Copenhagen-based company founded in 2021, and it's on a mission to help startups and scale-ups strengthen their people, culture, and performance. As a participant in Y Combinator's Summer 2021 batch, Zoios brings together human expertise and advanced data analytics in a unique SaaS offering designed to tackle the common challenges in organizational culture and employee engagement.

The platform works like this: it collects data to provide real-time insights that empower organizations to cultivate a thriving workplace. Instead of relying on intuition or guesswork, Zoios allows leaders to understand their teams' well-being at a granular level. This means recognizing stress signals, aligning goals, and utilizing individual strengths effectively.

At its core, Zoios has developed several key modules, including engagement pulse surveys, workplace assessments, and personalized feedback tools. These modules are crafted to ensure that leaders have everything they need to maintain a positive work environment while driving performance. The recent launch of their "Leadership Copilot," which leverages team data to provide actionable insights, illustrates their commitment to innovation in the mental health tech sector.

Here are a few noteworthy achievements and features of Zoios:
- **Impact Metrics**: Clients report an 18% increase in well-being, a 14% boost in job satisfaction, and a 19% reduction in work-related stress within the first six months of using the platform.
- **AI Integration**: Their use of artificial intelligence helps continuously analyze data and recommend best practices based on collective insights, ensuring leaders make informed decisions in real time.
- **Diverse Clientele**: Zoios is already used by numerous prominent companies, signaling its effectiveness and appeal across various industries.

Through its intuitive design, Zoios steers away from traditional top-down management styles, emphasizing a proactive approach to well-being‚Äîan essential ingredient for sustainable business success. Their goal is simple yet profound: to empower every organization to go beyond intuition and cultivate environments where every individual can excel. 

For anyone serious about enhancing their workplace culture and employee engagement, Zoios could be a game-changer. You can explore their offerings further at [zoios.io](https://zoios.io).
